tiles.name: Give 1
tiles.text: Give 1

tiles.name: Give 2
tiles.text: Give 2

tiles.name: Give 3
tiles.text: Give 4

tiles.name: Take 1
tiles.text: Take 1

tiles.name: Take 2
tiles.text: Take 2

tiles.name: Take 3
tiles.text: Take 4

tiles.name: Social
tiles.text: Everyone playing takes a drink.

tiles.name: Make Rule
tiles.text: Make a rule.

tiles.name: Strip 1
tiles.text: Remove 1 article of clothing.

tiles.name: Domino
tiles.text: Everyone drinks until the person next to them stops.

tiles.name: Casanova
tiles.text: Kiss the person to your right.

tiles.name: Bottoms Up!
tiles.text: Everyone except you must finish their drink :(

tiles.name: Hand Switch
tiles.text: Pick someone to play with their opposite hand for the rest of the game.

tiles.name: Categories
tiles.text: Categories for 2 minutes.  Drink while you think.

tiles.name: Sue Rule
tiles.text: Drink once for every word you say until the end of the game.

tiles.name: Southpaw
tiles.text: Everyone must pull pieces with their left hand only.

tiles.name: Impression
tiles.text: Do your best impression of someone at the table.

tiles.name: Down the Hatch
tiles.text: Finish your drink! :(

tiles.name: Peer Pressure
tiles.text: Drink 1 drink for each person playing the game.

tiles.name: Santa
tiles.text: The next person must take their turn sitting on your lap.

tiles.name: Buzz
tiles.text: Buzz for 2 minutes. Drink while you think.

tiles.name: Eye for an Eye
tiles.text: Every time you give a drink, you take a drink.

tiles.name: Kiss Phil
tiles.text: Kiss Phil (or appropriate substitute).
